text: There is also a Max Weber, German political economist and sociologist. \---- Maximilian "Max" Emil Weber (August 27, 1824 in Achern – June 15, 1901 in Brooklyn) was a military officer in the armies of Germany and later the United States, most known for serving as a brigadier general in the Union army during the American Civil War. == Other websites == *Max Weber Category:1824 births Category:1901 deaths Category:American Civil War generals Category:German military people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Baden-Württemberg
title: Max Weber (general)
